data.what_is:
Telagus is a leading CRM and team management solution designed to focus your attention on the essential growth-drivers that power your business. We have created an intuitive and easy to use platform that drives productivity, marketing and sales.

Telagus is priced, so it's affordable whether you're a start-up, SME or Enterprise business. The dashboard can be easily customised to suit your specific requirements, and the marketplace add-ons are designed to use as many or as few as you need without tying you into long-term contracts. It's both Plug n' Play and Pay-As-You-Go.

We can build a completely customised solution
Telagus has been built with the future in mind. If you need a bespoke solution, our team of engineers are ready to build and add to the core that Telagus provides. Please call, email, or click on the support button within Telagus to discuss your requirements.
data.product_description: Telagus is a business and marketing automation software developed by Telsa Media. You can manage all of your customer data, campaigns, projects and much more. Telagus includes many features and tools which can enhance your business and help you gain more leads. From email marketing and campaigns to form builders and live chats, Telagus can help organise your activity to help reach your business goals.

initial_reviews.review_title: One stop for all your CRM needs!!!!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Telagus?
I have seen a couple of CRM softwares so far, but I must say Telagus has really got my attention. The dashboard has really impressed me a lot, It concisely presents a glimse of all the stuff that needs immediate attention. Thanks to this I never miss an client and respond to them always on time. I really found it very easy to implement this, all the features are so simple and aptly spaced we dont have to search arround be it SMS, email, grouping, having a check and track on all the cold calls had never been so easy. Thanks to Tealgus!!!

What do you dislike about Telagus?
AI !!!! This is a big thing needed for the present trend. If telagus can integrate this creating custom emails will be faster and hand holds newly joined interns/freshers. I would recommend to please get this thing in, this could definitiely make the software stand out and help us in analysing the way we are heading. So far, this is something I thing that can be improved on....

What problems is Telagus solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am able to group and invite team members to collaborate. Tracking actions for each client has been very simple and fast. Tailoring the marketing methods targeting a particular domain of customers has become an easy job now. The analytics helps us to identify which customers/domain is particulary intersted in our product and with this help, we can target that particular domain and put more efforts towards that domain and make the best utilization of our efforts and time. Definitely there is a remarkable increased in our productivity!!! thanks to Telagus

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Telagus?
We are a security/alarms company that relies on the internet for our lead source and manages our jobs and after-sales service like repairs or annual servicing. Telagus has really helped us get organised and helped us close more sales, its really easy to operate, and the support is great. We have kept our customers fully informed with useful tools like email and SMS marketing, we also enjoy using the dashboard which lets us see the whole business operation including the sales pipeline. The quotation tool is brilliant as it keeps a template of all items for future use and you can send the quotes out for e-signing.

What do you dislike about Telagus?
The only thing that could be better is the email automation tool, its a bit difficult to use.

What problems is Telagus solving and how is that benefiting you?
we have made it a lot easier to manage our whole business, and without a doubt have made more sales than we would of without it, we used a few other crm's but this is much easier to use.
